titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices and Council. Mich. Armach. C. Granard. Whereas we are informed that divers of his Majesties subjects in several parts of this kingdom, being possessed with strange fears & groundless jealousies, have frequently of late deserted their own dwelling houses, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.

titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices and Council. Mich. Armach. C. Granard. Whereas we are informed that divers of his Majesties subjects in several parts of this kingdom, being possessed with strange fears & groundless jealousies, have frequently of late deserted their own dwelling houses, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Granard, Arthur Forbes, Earl of, 1623-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by Andrew Crook at the printing-house on Ormonde-Key, and Samuel Helsham at the Colledge-Arms in Castle-Street.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
At end of text: Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 24th day of July. 1685.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
